data.eml:eml: A taxonomic review of the genus Antepipona de Saussure, 1855 (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Eumeninae) from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kumar, Girish P., Carpenter, James M., Sureshan, Pavittu M. (2016): A taxonomic review of the genus Antepipona de Saussure, 1855 (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Eumeninae) from India. Zootaxa 4150 (5): 501-536, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4150.5.1
